Deanacyastityktaxea

Deanacyastityktaxea (also Deana or Blackbird) is a female creature in the Creation of Marlien which is a half-breed of succubus and Charon memitim.

She is a favoured Fourth_wall-breaking and world-breaking tool of the writer, frequently referencing things from Totum or the real world despite no in-universe explanation for why she might be able to travel between creations. She also makes direct appearances before mortals on The Material Plane of Marlien and otherwise flouts the the laws of the Charon to an extent, making excuses that due to her imperfect heritage she finds it difficult to properly transpose herself to the right time or location. As a result, she is at the centre of Material Plane legends of the Blackbird which began with the reckless exploits of her memitim mother, mikaotrexeaonoa.

History

Birth

Deana is the daughter of the famed Memitim Mikaotrexeaonoa and an unknown succubus.

Significant Interactions

Lucias

Deana was briefly acquainted with the sapient_skeleton summoner Lucias, whom she met in the forests of central Angdyne when tracking the location of the desolation at the site of the crux penetration. She initially attacked him, owing to a hatred of the necromancers, the undead, and their kin, but was deterred when her mother's scythe, Ayao failed to harm him - though it easily destroyed his Celestial Eidolon companion Angelo, which had only a Faux-soul.

Later Deana visited Lucias as he slept in a barn at Woodsfarm to inform him that she was to be his collector upon his demise, but first, through spying on his dreams, learned of the Charis Dea Antheraea's interest in him.

Equipment

Ayao

Raja
